item.description: Responsible party

item.name: gmd:seriesMetadata
item.description: Series metadata

item.name: gmd:subset
item.description: Subset

item.name: gmd:superset
item.description: Superset

item.name: gmd:textGroup
item.description: Text group

item.name: gmd:URL
item.description: URL

item.name: gmd:verticalCRS
item.description: Vertical CRS

item.name: gmd:abstract
item.description: Brief narrative summary of the content of the resource(s)

item.name: gmd:accessConstraints
item.description: Access constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations on obtaining the resource

item.name: gmd:address
item.description: Physical and email address at which the organization or individual may be contacted

item.name: gmd:administrativeArea
item.description: State, province of the location

item.name: gmd:alternateTitle
item.description: Short name or other language name by which the cited information is known. Example: "DCW" as an alternative title for "Digital Chart of the World

item.name: gmd:amendmentNumber
item.description: Amendment number of the format version

item.name: gmd:applicationProfile
item.description: Name of an application profile that can be used with the online resource

item.name: gmd:applicationSchemaInfo
item.description: Provides information about the conceptual schema of a dataset

item.name: gmd:attributeDescription
item.description: Description of the attribute described by the measurement value

item.name: gmd:attributeInstances
item.description: Attribute instances to which the information applies

item.name: gmd:attributes
item.description: Attributes to which the information applies

item.name: gmd:authority
item.description: Person or party responsible for maintenance of the namespace

item.name: gmd:bitsPerValue
item.description: Maximum number of significant bits in the uncompressed representation for the value in each band of each pixel

item.name: gmd:cameraCalibrationInformationAvailability
item.description: Indication of whether or not constants are available which allow for camera calibration corrections

item.name: gmd:cellGeometry
item.description: Identification of grid data as point or cell

item.name: gmd:centerPoint
item.description: Earth location in the coordinate system defined by the Spatial Reference System and the grid coordinate of the cell halfway between opposite ends of the grid in the spatial dimensions

item.name: gmd:characterSet
item.description: Full name of the character coding standard used for the metadata set

item.name: gmd:checkPointAvailability
item.description: Indication of whether or not geographic position points are available to test the accuracy of the georeferenced grid data

item.name: gmd:checkPointDescription
item.description: Description of geographic position points used to test the accuracy of the georeferenced grid data

item.name: gmd:CI_Address
item.description: Location of the responsible individual or organization

item.name: gmd:CI_Citation
item.description: Standardized resource reference

item.name: gmd:CI_Contact
item.description: Information required to enable contact with the responsible person and/or organization

item.name: gmd:CI_Date
item.description: Reference date and event used to describe it (YYYY-MM-DD)

item.name: gmd:CI_ResponsibleParty
item.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organizations associated with the dataset

item.name: gmd:CI_Series
item.description: Information about the series, or aggregate dataset, to which a dataset belongs

item.name: gmd:CI_Telephone
item.description: Telephone numbers for contacting the responsible individual or organization

item.name: gmd:citation
item.description: Citation data for the resource(s)

item.name: gmd:citedResponsibleParty
item.description: Name and position information for an individual or organization that is responsible for the resource

item.name: gmd:city
item.description: City of the location

item.name: gmd:classification
item.description: Name of the handling restrictions on the resource

item.name: gmd:classificationSystem
item.description: Name of the classification system

item.name: gmd:cloudCoverPercentage
item.description: Area of the dataset obscured by clouds, expressed as a percentage of the spatial extent

item.name: gmd:code
item.description: alphanumeric value identifying an instance in the namespace eg. coordinate system in EPSG namespace

item.name: gmd:collectiveTitle
item.description: Common title with holdings note. NOTE title identifies elements of a series collectively, combined with information about what volumes are available at the source cited

item.name: gmd:complianceCode
item.description: Indication of whether or not the cited feature catalogue complies with ISO 19110

item.name: gmd:compressionGenerationQuantity
item.description: Count of the number the number of lossy compression cycles performed on the image

item.name: gmd:condition
item.description: Condition under which the extended element is mandatory

item.name: gmd:constraintLanguage
item.description: Formal language used in Application Schema

item.name: gmd:contact
item.description: party responsible for the information provided

item.name: gmd:contactInfo
item.description: Address of the responsible party

item.name: gmd:contactInstructions
item.description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the individual or organization

item.name: gmd:contentInfo
item.description: Provides information about the feature catalogue and describes the coverage and image data characteristics

item.name: gmd:contentType
item.description: Type of information represented by the cell value

item.name: gmd:controlPointAvailability
item.description: Indication of whether or not control point(s) exists

item.name: gmd:cornerPoints
item.description: Earth location in the coordinate system defined by the Spatial Reference System and the grid coordinate of the cells at opposite ends of grid coverage along two diagonals in the grid spatial dimensions. There are four corner points in a georectified grid; at least two corner points along one diagonal are required

item.name: gmd:country
item.description: Country of the physical address

item.name: gmd:credit
item.description: Recognition of those who contributed to the resource(s)

item.name: gmd:dataQualityInfo
item.description: Provides overall assessment of quality of a resource(s)

item.name: gmd:dataset
item.description: Dataset to which the information applies

item.name: gmd:dataType
item.description: Code which identifies the kind of valueprovidedeprovided in the extended element

item.name: gmd:date
item.description: Reference date for the cited resource (YYYY-MM-DD)

item.name: gmd:dateOfNextUpdate
item.description: Scheduled revision date for resource (YYYY-MM-DD)

item.name: gmd:dateStamp
item.description: Date that the metadata was created (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

item.name: gmd:dateTime
item.description: Date and time or range of date and time on or over which the process step occurred (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

item.name: gmd:dateType
item.description: Event used for reference date

item.name: gmd:definition
item.description: Definition of the extended element

item.name: gmd:deliveryPoint
item.description: Address line for the location (as described in ISO 11180, annex A)

item.name: gmd:denominator
item.description: The number below the line in a vulgar fraction

item.name: gmd:density
item.description: Density at which the data is recorded

item.name: gmd:densityUnits
item.description: Units of measure for the recording density

item.name: gmd:description
item.description: Description of the event, including related parameters or tolerances

item.name: gmd:descriptiveKeywords
item.description: Provides category keywords, their type, and reference source

item.name: gmd:descriptor
item.description: Description of the range of a cell measurement value

item.name: gmd:dimension
item.description: Information on the dimensions of the cell measurement value

item.name: gmd:dimensionName
item.description: Name of the axis

item.name: gmd:dimensionSize
item.description: Number of elements along the axis

item.name: gmd:distance
item.description: Ground sample distance

item.name: gmd:distributionInfo
item.description: Provides information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource(s)

item.name: gmd:distributor
item.description: Provides information about the distributor

item.name: gmd:distributorContact
item.description: Party from whom the resource may be obtained. This list need not be exhaustive

item.name: gmd:distributorFormat
item.description: Provides information about the format used by the distributor

item.name: gmd:distributorTransferOptions
item.description: Provides information about the technical means and media used by the distributor

item.name: gmd:domainCode
item.description: Three digit code assigned to the extended element

item.name: gmd:domainOfValidity
item.description: Range which is valid for the referencesystem

item.name: gmd:domainValue
item.description: Valid values that can be assigned to the extended element

item.name: gmd:DQ_AbsoluteExternalPositionalAccuracy
item.description: Closeness of reported coordinate values to values accepted as or being true

item.name: gmd:DQ_AccuracyOfATimeMeasurement
item.description: Correctness of the temporal references of an item (reporting of error in time measurement)

item.name: gmd:DQ_CompletenessCommission
item.description: Excess data present in the dataset, as described by the scope

item.name: gmd:DQ_CompletenessOmission
item.description: Data absent from the dataset, as described by the scope

item.name: gmd:DQ_ConceptualConsistency
item.description: Adherence to rules of the conceptual schema

item.name: gmd:DQ_ConformanceResult
item.description: Information about the outcome of evaluating the obtained value (or set of values) against a specified acceptable conformance quality level

item.name: gmd:DQ_DataQuality
item.description: Quality information for the data specified by a data quality scope

item.name: gmd:DQ_DomainConsistency
item.description: Adherence of values to the value domains

item.name: gmd:DQ_EvaluationMethodTypeCode
item.description: Type of method for evaluating an identified data quality measure

item.name: gmd:DQ_FormatConsistency
item.description: Degree to which data is stored in accordance with the physical structure of the dataset, as described by the scope

item.name: gmd:DQ_GriddedDataPositionalAccuracy
item.description: Closeness of gridded data position values to values accepted as or being true

item.name: gmd:DQ_NonQuantitativeAttributeAccuracy
item.description: Correctness of non-quantitative attributes

item.name: gmd:DQ_QuantitativeAttributeAccuracy
item.description: Accuracy of quantitative attributes

item.name: gmd:DQ_QuantitativeResult
item.description: Information about the value (or set of values) obtained from applying a data quality measure

item.name: gmd:DQ_RelativeInternalPositionalAccuracy
item.description: Closeness of the relative positions of features in the scope to their respective relative positions accepted as or being true

item.name: gmd:DQ_Scope
item.description: Description of the data specified by the scope

item.name: gmd:DQ_TemporalConsistency
item.description: Correctness of ordered events or sequences, if reported

item.name: gmd:DQ_TemporalValidity
item.description: Validity of data specified by the scope with respect to time

item.name: gmd:DQ_ThematicClassificationCorrectness
item.description: Comparison of the classes assigned to features or their attributes to a universe of discourse

item.name: gmd:DQ_TopologicalConsistency
item.description: Correctness of the explicitly encoded topological characteristics of the dataset as described by the scope

item.name: gmd:DS_AssociationTypeCode
item.description: Justification for the correlation of two datasets

item.name: gmd:DS_InitiativeTypeCode
item.description: Type of aggregation activity in which datasets are related

item.name: gmd:eastBoundLongitude
item.description: Eastern-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

item.name: gmd:edition
item.description: Version of the cited resource

item.name: gmd:editionDate
item.description: Date of the edition (YYYY-MM-DD)

item.name: gmd:electronicMailAddress
item.description: Address of the electronic mailbox of the responsible organization or individual

item.name: gmd:environmentDescription
item.description: Description of the dataset in the producer_s processing environment, including items such as the software, the computer operating system, file name, and the dataset size

item.name: gmd:equivalentScale
item.description: Level of detail expressed as the scale of a comparable hardcopy map or chart

item.name: gmd:errorStatistic
item.description: Statistical method used to determine the value

item.name: gmd:evaluationMethodDescription
item.description: Description of the evaluation method

item.name: gmd:evaluationMethodType
item.description: Type of method used to evaluate quality of the dataset

item.name: gmd:evaluationProcedure
item.description: Reference to the procedure information

item.name: gmd:EX_BoundingPolygon
item.description: Boundary enclosing the dataset, expressed as the closed set of (x,y) coordinates of the polygon (last point replicates first point)

item.name: gmd:EX_Extent
item.description: Information about spatial, vertical, and temporal extent

item.name: gmd:EX_GeographicBoundingBox
item.description: Geographic position of the dataset

item.name: gmd:EX_GeographicDescription
item.description: Description of the geographic area using identifiers

item.name: gmd:EX_TemporalExtent
item.description: Time period covered by the content of the dataset

item.name: gmd:EX_VerticalExtent
item.description: Vertical domain of dataset

item.name: gmd:explanation
item.description: Explanation of the meaning of conformance for this result

item.name: gmd:extendedElementInformation
item.description: Provides information about a new metadata element, not found in ISO 19115, which is required to describe geographic data

item.name: gmd:extensionOnLineResource
item.description: Information about on-line sources containing the community profile name and the extended metadata elements. Information for all new metadata elements

item.name: gmd:extent
item.description: Information about the spatial, vertical and temporal extent of the data specified by the scope

item.name: gmd:extentTypeCode
item.description: Indication of whether the bounding polygon encompasses an area covered by the data or an area where data is not present. Possible values: '1' for inclusion or '0' for exclusion

item.name: gmd:facsimile
item.description: Telephone number of a facsimile machine for the responsible organization or individual

item.name: gmd:featureCatalogueCitation
item.description: Complete bibliographic reference to one or more external feature catalogues

item.name: gmd:featureInstances
item.description: Feature instances to which the information applies

item.name: gmd:features
item.description: Features to which the information applies

item.name: gmd:featureTypes
item.description: Subset of feature types from cited feature catalogue occurring in data

item.name: gmd:fees
item.description: Fees and terms for retrieving the resource. Include monetary units (as specified in ISO 4217)

item.name: gmd:fileDecompressionTechnique
item.description: Recommendations of algorithms or processes that can be applied to read or expand resources to which compression techniques have been applied

item.name: gmd:fileDescription
item.description: Text description of the illustration

item.name: gmd:fileIdentifier
item.description: Unique identifier for this metadata file

item.name: gmd:fileName
item.description: Name of the file that contains a graphic that provides an illustration of the dataset

item.name: gmd:fileType
item.description: Format in which the illustration is encoded

item.name: gmd:filmDistortionInformationAvailability
item.description: Indication of whether or not Calibration Reseau information is available

item.name: gmd:formatDistributor
item.description: Provides information about the distributor fformat

item.name: gmd:function
item.description: Code for function performed by the online resource

item.name: gmd:geographicElement
item.description: Provides geographic component of the extent of the referring object

item.name: gmd:geographicIdentifier
item.description: Identifier used to represent a geographic area

item.name: gmd:geometricObjectCount
item.description: Total number of the point or vector object type occurring in the dataset

item.name: gmd:geometricObjects
item.description: Information about the geometric objects used in the dataset

item.name: gmd:geometricObjectType
item.description: Name of point and vector spatial objects used to locate zero-, one-, and two-dimensional spatial locations in the dataset

item.name: gmd:graphicOverview
item.description: Provides a graphic that illustrates the resource(s) (should include a legend for the graphic)

item.name: gmd:graphicsFile
item.description: Full application schema given as a graphics file

item.name: gmd:handlingDescription
item.description: Additional information about the restrictions on handling the resource

item.name: gmd:hierarchyLevel
item.description: Scope to which the metadata applies (see annex H for more information about metadata hierarchy levels)

item.name: gmd:hierarchyLevelName
item.description: Name of the hierarchy levels for which the metadata is provided

item.name: gmd:hoursOfService
item.description: Time period (including time zone) when individuals can contact the organization or individual

item.name: gmd:identificationInfo
item.description: Basic information about the resource(s) to which the metadata applies

item.name: gmd:identifier
item.description: Unique identifier for the resource. EXAMPLE: Universal Product Code (UPC), National Stock Number (NSN)

item.name: gmd:illuminationAzimuthAngle
item.description: Illumination azimuth measured in degrees clockwise from true north at the time the image is taken. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image

item.name: gmd:illuminationElevationAngle
item.description: Illumination elevation measured in degrees clockwise from the target plane at intersection of the optical line of sight with the Earth_s surface. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image

item.name: gmd:imageQualityCode
item.description: Specifies the image quality

item.name: gmd:imagingCondition
item.description: Conditions affected the image

item.name: gmd:includedWithDataset
item.description: Indication of whether or not the feature catalogue is included with the dataset

item.name: gmd:individualName
item.description: Name of the responsible person- surname, given name, title separated by a delimiter

item.name: gmd:ISBN
item.description: International Standard Book Number

item.name: gmd:ISSN
item.description: International Standard Serial Number

item.name: gmd:issueIdentification
item.description: Information identifying the issue of the series

item.name: gmd:keyword
item.description: Commonly used word(s) or formalised word(s) or phrase(s) used to describe the subject

item.name: gmd:language
item.description: Language used for documenting metadata

item.name: gmd:languageCode
item.description: Language used for documenting a plain text

item.name: gmd:lensDistortionInformationAvailability
item.description: Indication of whether or not lens aberration correction information is available

item.name: gmd:level
item.description: Hierarchical level of the data specified by the scope

item.name: gmd:levelDescription
item.description: Detailed description about the level of the data specified by the scope

item.name: gmd:LI_Lineage
item.description: Information about the events or source data used in constructing the data specified by the scope or lack of knowledge about lineage

item.name: gmd:LI_ProcessStep
item.description: Information about an event in the creation process for the data specified by the scope

item.name: gmd:LI_Source
item.description: Information about the source data used in creating the data specified by the scope

item.name: gmd:lineage
item.description: Non-quantitative quality information about the lineage of the data specified by the scope

item.name: gmd:linkage
item.description: Location (address) for on-line access using a Uniform Resource Locator address or similar addressing scheme such as http://www.statkart.no/isotc211

item.name: gmd:maintenanceAndUpdateFrequency
item.description: Frequency with which changes and additions are made to the resource after the initial resource is completed

item.name: gmd:maintenanceNote
item.description: Information regarding specific requirements for maintaining the resource

item.name: gmd:maximumOccurrence
item.description: Maximum occurrence of the extended element

item.name: gmd:maximumValue
item.description: Highest vertical extent contained in the dataset

item.name: gmd:maxValue
item.description: Longest wavelength that the sensor is capable of collecting within a designated band

item.name: gmd:MD_ApplicationSchemaInformation
item.description: Information about the application schema used to build the dataset

item.name: gmd:MD_Band
item.description: Range of wavelengths in the electromagnetic spectrum

item.name: gmd:MD_BrowseGraphic
item.description: Graphic that provides an illustration of the dataset (should include a legend for the graphic)

item.name: gmd:MD_CellGeometryCode
item.description: Code indicating whether grid data is point or area

item.name: gmd:MD_CharacterSetCode
item.description: Name of the character coding standard used for the resource

item.name: gmd:MD_ClassificationCode
item.description: Name of the handling restrictions on the dataset

item.name: gmd:MD_Constraints
item.description: Restrictions on the access and use of a resource or metadata

item.name: gmd:MD_CoverageContentTypeCode
item.description: Specific type of information represented in the cell

item.name: gmd:MD_CoverageDescription
item.description: Information about the content of a grid data cell

item.name: gmd:MD_DataIdentification
item.description: Information required to identify a dataset

item.name: gmd:MD_DatatypeCode
item.description: Datatype of element or entity

item.name: gmd:MD_DigitalTransferOptions
item.description: Technical means and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor

item.name: gmd:MD_Dimension
item.description: Axis properties

item.name: gmd:MD_DimensionNameTypeCode
item.description: Name of the dimension

item.name: gmd:MD_Distribution
item.description: Information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource

item.name: gmd:MD_Distributor
item.description: Information about the distributor

item.name: gmd:MD_ExtendedElementInformation
item.description: New metadata element, not found in ISO 19115, which is required to describe geographic data

item.name: gmd:MD_FeatureCatalogueDescription
item.description: Information identifying the feature catalogue

item.name: gmd:MD_Format
item.description: Description of the computer language construct that specifies the representation of data objects in a record, file, message, storage device or transmission channel

item.name: gmd:MD_GeometricObjects
item.description: Number of objects, listed by geometric object type, used in the dataset

item.name: gmd:MD_GeometricObjectTypeCode
item.description: Name of point and vector spatial objects used to locate zero-, one-, and two-dimensional spatial locations in the dataset

item.name: gmd:MD_Georectified
item.description: Grid whose cells are regularly spaced in a geographic (i.e., lat / long) or map coordinate system defined in the Spatial Referencing System (SRS) so that any cell in the grid can be geolocated given its grid coordinate and the grid origin, cell spacing, and orientation

item.name: gmd:MD_Georeferenceable
item.description: Grid with cells irregularly spaced in any given geographic/map projection coordinate system, whose individual cells can be geolocated using geolocation information supplied with the data but cannot be geolocated from the grid properties alone

item.name: gmd:MD_GridSpatialRepresentation
item.description: Information about grid spatial objects in the dataset

item.name: gmd:MD_Identifier
item.description: Value uniquely identifying an object within a namespace

item.name: gmd:MD_ImageDescription
item.description: Information about an image_s suitability for use

item.name: gmd:MD_ImagingConditionCode
item.description: Code which indicates conditions which may affect the image

item.name: gmd:MD_Keywords
item.description: Keywords, their type and reference source

item.name: gmd:MD_KeywordTypeCode
item.description: Methods used to group similar keywords

item.name: gmd:MD_LegalConstraints
item.description: Restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource

item.name: gmd:MD_MaintenanceFrequencyCode
item.description: Code frequency with which modifications and deletions are made to the data after it isfirst produced

item.name: gmd:MD_MaintenanceInformation
item.description: Information about the scope and frequency of updating

item.name: gmd:MD_Medium
item.description: Information about the media on which the resource can be distributed

item.name: gmd:MD_MediumFormatCode
item.description: Method used to write to the medium

item.name: gmd:MD_MediumNameCode
item.description: Name of the medium

item.name: gmd:MD_Metadata
item.description: Root entity which defines metadata about a resource or resources

item.name: gmd:MD_MetadataExtensionInformation
item.description: Information describing metadata extensions

item.name: gmd:MD_ObligationCode
item.description: Obligation of the element or entity

item.name: gmd:MD_PixelOrientationCode
item.description: Point in a pixel corresponding to the Earth location of the pixel

item.name: gmd:MD_PortrayalCatalogueReference
item.description: Information identifying the portrayal catalogue used

item.name: gmd:MD_ProgressCode
item.description: Status of the dataset or progress of a review

item.name: gmd:MD_RangeDimension
item.description: Information on the range of each dimension of a cell measurement value

item.name: gmd:MD_ReferenceSystem
item.description: Information about the reference system.

item.name: gmd:MD_RepresentativeFraction
item.description: Derived from Scale where MD_RepresentativeFraction.denominator = 1 / Scale.measure And Scale.targetUnits = Scale.sourceUnits

item.name: gmd:MD_Resolution
item.description: Level of detail expressed as a scale factor or a ground distance

item.name: gmd:MD_RestrictionCode
item.description: Limitation(s) placed upon the access or use of the data

item.name: gmd:MD_ScopeCode
item.description: Class of information to which the referencing entity applies

item.name: gmd:MD_ScopeDescription
item.description: Description of the class of information covered by the information

item.name: gmd:MD_SecurityConstraints
item.description: Handling restrictions imposed on the resource for national security or similar security concerns

item.name: gmd:MD_ServiceIdentification
item.description: Identification of capabilities which a serviceprovider makes available to a service user through a set of interfaces that define a behaviour - See ISO 19119 ? Services for furtherinformation

item.name: gmd:MD_SpatialRepresentationTypeCode
item.description: Method used to represent geographic information in the dataset

item.name: gmd:MD_StandardOrderProcess
item.description: Common ways in which the resource may be obtained or received, and related instructions and fee information

item.name: gmd:MD_TopicCategoryCode
item.description: High-level geographic data thematic classification to assist in the grouping and search of available geographic data sets. Can be used to group keywords as well. Listed examples are not exhaustive. NOTE It is understood there are overlaps between general categories and the user is encouraged to select the one most appropriate.

item.name: gmd:MD_TopologyLevelCode
item.description: Degree of complexity of the spatial relationships

item.name: gmd:MD_Usage
item.description: Brief description of ways in which the resource(s) is/are currently used

item.name: gmd:MD_VectorSpatialRepresentation
item.description: Information about the vector spatial objects in the dataset

item.name: gmd:measureDescription
item.description: Description of the measure being determined

item.name: gmd:measureIdentification
item.description: Code identifying a registered standard procedure

item.name: gmd:mediumFormat
item.description: Method used to write to the medium

item.name: gmd:mediumNote
item.description: Description of other limitations or requirements for using the medium

item.name: gmd:metadataConstraints
item.description: Provides restrictions on the access and use of data

item.name: gmd:metadataExtensionInfo
item.description: Information describing metadata extensions

item.name: gmd:metadataMaintenance
item.description: Provides information about the frequency of metadata updates, and the scope of those updates

item.name: gmd:metadataStandardName
item.description: Name of the metadata standard (including profile name) used

item.name: gmd:metadataStandardVersion
item.description: Version (profile) of the metadata standard used

item.name: gmd:minimumValue
item.description: Lowest vertical extent contained in the dataset

item.name: gmd:minValue
item.description: Shortest wavelength that the sensor is capable of collecting within a designated band

item.name: gmd:name
item.description: Name of the series, or aggregate dataset, of which the dataset is a part

item.name: gmd:nameOfMeasure
item.description: Name of the test applied to the data

item.name: gmd:northBoundLatitude
item.description: Northern-most, coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

item.name: gmd:numberOfDimensions
item.description: Number of independent spatial-temporal axes

item.name: gmd:obligation
item.description: Obligation of the extended element

item.name: gmd:offLine
item.description: Information about offline media on whichthe resource can be obtaned

item.name: gmd:offset
item.description: The physical value corresponding to a cell value of zero

item.name: gmd:onLine
item.description: Information about online sources from which the resource can be obtained

item.name: gmd:orderingInstructions
item.description: General instructions, terms and services provided by the distributor

item.name: gmd:organisationName
item.description: Name of the responsible organization

item.name: gmd:orientationParameterAvailability
item.description: Indication of whether or not orientation parameters are available

item.name: gmd:orientationParameterDescription
item.description: description of parameters used to describe sensor orientation

item.name: gmd:other
item.description: Class of information that does not fall into the other categories to which the information applies

item.name: gmd:otherCitationDetails
item.description: Other information required to complete the citation that is not recorded elsewhere

item.name: gmd:otherConstraints
item.description: Other restrictions and legal prerequisites for accessing and using the resource

item.name: gmd:page
item.description: Details on which pages of the publication the article was published

item.name: gmd:parameterCitation
item.description: Reference providing description of the parameters

item.name: gmd:parentEntity
item.description: Name of the metadata entity(s) under which this extended metadata element may appear. The name(s) may be standard metadata element(s) or other extended metadata element(s).

item.name: gmd:parentIdentifier
item.description: File identifier of the metadata to which this metadata is a subset (child)

item.name: gmd:pass
item.description: Indication of the conformance result where 0 = fail and 1 = pass

item.name: gmd:peakResponse
item.description: Wavelength at which the response is the highest

item.name: gmd:phone
item.description: Telephone numbers at which the organization or individual may be contacted

item.name: gmd:plannedAvailableDateTime
item.description: Date and time when the dataset will be available (CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

item.name: gmd:pointInPixel
item.description: Point in a pixel corresponding to the Earth location of the pixel

item.name: gmd:pointOfContact
item.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organizations(s) associated with the resource(s)

item.name: gmd:polygon
item.description: Sets of points defining the bounding polygon

item.name: gmd:portrayalCatalogueCitation
item.description: Bibliographic reference to the portrayal catalogue cited

item.name: gmd:portrayalCatalogueInfo
item.description: Provides information about the catalogue of rules defined for the portrayal of a resource(s)

item.name: gmd:positionName
item.description: Role or position of the responsible person

item.name: gmd:postalCode
item.description: ZIP or other postcode

item.name: gmd:presentationForm
item.description: Mode in which the resource is represented

item.name: gmd:processingLevelCode
item.description: Image distributor_s code that identifies the level of radiometric and geometric processing that has been applied

item.name: gmd:processor
item.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organization(s) associated with the process step

item.name: gmd:processStep
item.description: Information about an event in the creation process for the data specified by the scope

item.name: gmd:protocol
item.description: Connection protocol to be used

item.name: gmd:PT_FreeText
item.description: Description of a multi-language free text metadata element

item.name: gmd:purpose
item.description: Summary of the intentions with which the resource(s) was developed

item.name: gmd:radiometricCalibrationDataAvailability
item.description: Indication of whether or not the radiometric calibration information for generating the radiometrically calibrated standard data product is available

item.name: gmd:rationale
item.description: Requirement or purpose for the process step

item.name: gmd:referenceSystemIdentifier
item.description: Name of reference system

item.name: gmd:referenceSystemInfo
item.description: Description of the spatial and temporal reference systems used in the dataset

item.name: gmd:report
item.description: Quantitative quality information for the data specified by the scope

item.name: gmd:resolution
item.description: Degree of detail in the grid dataset

item.name: gmd:resourceConstraints
item.description: Provides information about constraints which apply to the resource(s)

item.name: gmd:resourceFormat
item.description: Provides a description of the format of the resource(s)

item.name: gmd:resourceMaintenance
item.description: Provides information about the frequency of resource updates, and the scope of those updates

item.name: gmd:resourceSpecificUsage
item.description: Provides basic information about specific application(s) for which the resource(s) has/have been or is being used by different users

item.name: gmd:result
item.description: Value (or set of values) obtained from applying a data quality measure or the out come of evaluating the obtained value (or set of values) against a specified acceptable conformance quality level

item.name: gmd:role
item.description: Function performed by the responsible party

item.name: gmd:RS_Identifier
item.description: Identifier used for reference systems

item.name: gmd:rule
item.description: Specifies how the extended element relates to other existing elements and entities

item.name: gmd:scaleDenominator
item.description: denominator of the source data scale eg. for 1:1000 enter 1000

item.name: gmd:scaleFactor
item.description: Scale factor which has been applied to the cell value

item.name: gmd:schemaAscii
item.description: Full application schema given as an ASCII file

item.name: gmd:schemaLanguage
item.description: Identification of the schema language used

item.name: gmd:scope
item.description: The specific data to which the data quality information applies

item.name: gmd:sequenceIdentifier
item.description: Number that uniquely identifies instances of bands of wavelengths on which a sensor operates

item.name: gmd:series
item.description: Information about the series, or aggregate dataset, of which the dataset is a part

item.name: gmd:shortName
item.description: Short form suitable for use in an implementation method such as XML or SGML. NOTE other methods may be used

item.name: gmd:softwareDevelopmentFile
item.description: Full application schema given as a software development file

item.name: gmd:softwareDevelopmentFileFormat
item.description: Software dependent format used for the application schema software dependent file

item.name: gmd:source
item.description: Information about the source data used in creating the data specified by the scope

item.name: gmd:sourceCitation
item.description: Recommended reference to be used for the source data

item.name: gmd:sourceExtent
item.description: Information about the spatial, vertical and temporal extent of the source data

item.name: gmd:sourceReferenceSystem
item.description: Spatial reference system used by the source data

item.name: gmd:sourceStep
item.description: Information about an event in the creation process for the source data

item.name: gmd:southBoundLatitude
item.description: Southern-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

item.name: gmd:spatialExtent
item.description: Spatial extent component of composite spatial and temporal extent

item.name: gmd:spatialRepresentationInfo
item.description: Digital representation of spatial information in the dataset

item.name: gmd:spatialRepresentationType
item.description: Method used to spatially represent geographic information

item.name: gmd:spatialResolution
item.description: Factor which provides a general understanding of the density of spatial data in the dataset

item.name: gmd:specification
item.description: Name of a subset, profile, or product specification of the format

item.name: gmd:specificUsage
item.description: Brief description of the resource and/or resource series usage

item.name: gmd:statement
item.description: General explanation of the data producer_s knowledge about the lineage of a dataset

item.name: gmd:status
item.description: Status of the resource(s)

item.name: gmd:supplementalInformation
item.description: Any other descriptive information about the dataset

item.name: gmd:temporalElement
item.description: Provides temporal component of the extent of the referring object

item.name: gmd:thesaurusName
item.description: Name of the formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of keywords

item.name: gmd:title
item.description: Name by which the cited resource is known

item.name: gmd:toneGradation
item.description: Number of discrete numerical values in the grid data

item.name: gmd:topicCategory
item.description: Main theme(s) of the datset

item.name: gmd:topologyLevel
item.description: Code which identifies the degree of complexity of the spatial relationships

item.name: gmd:transferOptions
item.description: Provides information about technical means and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor

item.name: gmd:transferSize
item.description: Estimated size of a unit in the specified transfer format, expressed in megabytes. The transfer size is > 0.0

item.name: gmd:transformationDimensionDescription
item.description: Description of the information about which grid dimensions are the spatial dimensions

item.name: gmd:transformationDimensionMapping
item.description: Information about which grid dimensions are the spatial dimensions

item.name: gmd:transformationParameterAvailability
item.description: Indication of whether or not parameters for transformation exists

item.name: gmd:triangulationIndicator
item.description: Indication of whether or not triangulation has been performed upon the image

item.name: gmd:turnaround
item.description: Typical turnaround time for the filling of an order

item.name: gmd:type
item.description: Subject matter used to group similar keywords

item.name: gmd:units
item.description: Units in which sensor wavelengths are expressed

item.name: gmd:unitsOfDistribution
item.description: Tiles, layers, geographic areas, etc., in which data is available

item.name: gmd:updateScope
item.description: Scope of data to which maintenance is applied

item.name: gmd:updateScopeDescription
item.description: Additional information about the range or extent of the resource

item.name: gmd:usageDateTime
item.description: Date and time of the first use or range of uses of the resource and/or resource series (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

item.name: gmd:useConstraints
item.description: Constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations or warnings on using the resource

item.name: gmd:useLimitation
item.description: Limitation affecting the fitness for use of the resource. Example, _not to be used for navigation_

item.name: gmd:userContactInfo
item.description: Identification of and means of communicating with person(s) and organization(s) using the resource(s)

item.name: gmd:userDefinedMaintenanceFrequency
item.description: Maintenance period other than those defined

item.name: gmd:userDeterminedLimitations
item.description: Applications, determined by the user for which the resource and/or resource series is not suitable

item.name: gmd:userNote
item.description: Explanation of the application of the legal constraints or other restrictions and legal prerequisites for obtaining and using the resource

item.name: gmd:valueType
item.description: Value type for reporting a data quality result

item.name: gmd:valueUnit
item.description: Value unit for reporting a data quality result

item.name: gmd:version
item.description: Version of the format (date, number, etc.)

item.name: gmd:verticalElement
item.description: Provides vertical component of the extent of the referring object

item.name: gmd:voice
item.description: Telephone number by which individuals can speak to the responsible organization or individual

item.name: gmd:volumes
item.description: Number of items in the media identified

item.name: gmd:westBoundLongitude
item.description: Western-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

item.name: gco:Date
item.description: Formatted as 2007-09-12 (YYYY-MM-DD)

item.name: gco:DateTime
item.description: Formatted as 2007-09-12T15:00:00 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

item.name: gts:TM_PeriodDuration
item.description:
The duration data type is used to specify a time interval.
The time interval is specified in the following form "PnYnMnDTnHnMnS" where:
* P indicates the period (required) * nY indicates the number of years * nM indicates the number of months * nD indicates the number of days * T indicates the start of a time section (required if you are going to specify hours, minutes, or seconds) * nH indicates the number of hours * nM indicates the number of minutes * nS indicates the number of seconds

item.name: gml:beginPosition
item.description: Formatted as 2007-09-12T15:00:00 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

item.name: gml:endPosition
item.description: Formatted as 2007-09-12T15:00:00 (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss)

item.name: gml:relatedTime
item.description: Defines the relation of a given time to the object.

item.name: gml:coordinates
item.description: Used to record an array of tuples or coordinates.

item.name: gml:Polygon
item.description: A gml:Polygon is a special surface that is defined by a single surface patch. The boundary of this patch is coplanar and the polygon uses planar interpolation in its interior.

item.name: gml:Point
item.description: A gml:Point is defined by a single coordinate tuple.

item.name: gml:LineString
item.description: A gml:LineString is a special curve that consists of a single segment with linear interpolation. It is defined by two or more coordinate tuples, with linear interpolation between them.

item.name: gml:LinearRing
item.description: A gml:LinearRing is defined by four or more coordinate tuples, with linear interpolation between them; the first and last coordinates shall be coincident.

item.name: gml:exterior
item.description: The outer boundary of a solid.

item.name: gml:interior
item.description: The inner boundary of a solid.

item.name: gml:id
item.description: Identifier

item.name: srsName
item.description: Name of the Spatial Reference System. By default set to geographic (epsg:4326)

item.name: uuidref
item.description: UUID of the resource being linked to this element

item.name: srv:SV_ServiceIdentification
item.description: ISO 19119-2005 Service Identification

item.name: srv:serviceType
item.description: Service type name from a registry of services. For example, the values of the nameSpace and name attributes of GeneralName may be 'OGC' and 'catalogue'

item.name: srv:serviceTypeVersion
item.description: Provides for searching based on the version of serviceType. For example, we may only be interested in OGC Catalogue V1.1 services. If version is maintained as a separate attribute, users can easily search for all services of a type regardless of the version

item.name: srv:accessProperties
item.description: Information about the availability of the service eg. fees, availability, oredering instructions

item.name: srv:restrictions
item.description: Legal and security constraints on accessing the service and distributing data generated by the service

item.name: srv:containsOperations
item.description: Provides information about the operations that comprise the service

item.name: srv:operatesOn
item.description: Provides information on the datasets that the service operates on

item.name: srv:operationName
item.description: A unique identifier for this interface

item.name: srv:SV_OperationMetadata
item.description: Operation Metadata

item.name: srv:DCP
item.description: Distributed computing platforms on which the operation has been implemented

item.name: srv:DCPList
item.description: List of distributed computing platforms on which the operation has been implemented

item.name: srv:operationDescription
item.description: Free text description of the intent of the operation and the results of the operation

item.name: srv:invocationName
item.description: The name used to invoke this interface within the context of the DCP. The name is identical for all DCPs

item.name: srv:parameters
item.description: The parameters that are required for this interface

item.name: srv:connectPoint
item.description: Handle for accessing the service interface

item.name: srv:dependsOn
item.description: List of operations that must be completed immediately before current operation is invoked, structured as a list for capturing alternate predecessor paths and sets for capturing parallel predecessor paths

item.name: srv:providerName
item.description: A unique identifier for this organization

item.name: srv:serviceContact
item.description: Information for contacting the service provider

item.name: srv:name
item.description: The name, as used by the service for this chain or paramater

item.name: srv:description
item.description: Narrative explanation of the services in the chain and resulting output or role of the parameter

item.name: srv:optionality
item.description: Indication if the parameter is required

item.name: srv:repeatability
item.description: Indication if more than one value of the parameter may be provided

item.name: srv:coupledResource
item.description: Details of services coupled with this one

item.name: srv:SV_CoupledResource
item.description: Details of services coupled with this one

item.name: srv:identifier
item.description: Identifier of resource to which the operation applies

item.name: srv:couplingType
item.description: Type of Coupling

item.name: srv:SV_CouplingType
item.description: Type of Coupling

item.name: srv:extent
item.description: Geographic/Temporal Extent of Service

item.name: srv:keywords
item.description: Keywords describing service

item.name: zone
item.description: Unique identifier for 100,000 metre grid zone

item.name: InDirectReferenceSystem
item.displayName: Indirect projection system (for non geographical resources)
item.description: ReferenceSystem derived / specify that it is an indirect reference

item.name: DirectReferenceSystem
item.description: ReferenceSystem derived / specify that it is a direct reference

item.name: code
item.description: Code. i.e. EPSG code.

item.name: label
item.description: Content

item.name: codeSpace
item.description: Authority responsible for codification. i.e. EPSG
